analysis.purpose: The purpose of this CSS file is to style a dashboard for displaying various metrics and data.
analysis.description: This code defines the styles for the dashboard, including the layout, colors, fonts, and other visual elements. It also includes utility classes for displaying different views and animations.
analysis.dependencies_analysis: No external dependencies are used in this file.
analysis.architectural_role: Defines the visual styling of the dashboard.
analysis.performance_notes: Optimization opportunities: Minifying and compressing the file, using CSS variables to reduce repetition.
analysis.maintainability: Code is well-structured and easy to read, but additional comments or documentation would be helpful.
